Hidden.description: No line of sight to an explorer.

actions.title: Ambush
actions.description: The guard sets up an ambush, waiting silently.

actions.title: Recon
actions.description: The guard is scouting the area, looking for any intruders.

actions.title: Surveillance
actions.description: The guard keeps watch over a wide area, ensuring no one escapes notice.

actions.title: Evasive
actions.description: The guard avoids direct confrontation, retreating into shadows.

Engaged.description: Actively fighting or in close combat.

actions.title: Attack
actions.description: The guard attacks furiously at the nearest target.

actions.title: Guard Posture
actions.description: The guard assumes a defensive stance, readying for an attack.

actions.title: Tactical Advance
actions.description: The guard advances strategically to overtake enemies.

actions.title: Charged Attack
actions.description: The guard launches a powerful, reckless attack.

Close.description: Within close range but not in active combat.

actions.title: Snipe
actions.description: The guard takes aim from a distance, preparing a deadly shot.

actions.title: Monitor
actions.description: The guard watches closely, ready to react.

actions.title: Reconnaissance
actions.description: The guard surveys the terrain, preparing for strategic movements.

actions.title: Retreat
actions.description: The guard begins a tactical retreat to regroup.

Other.description: Not in combat, performing other duties.

actions.title: Patrol
actions.description: The guard is on a routine patrol, scanning the surroundings.

actions.title: Rest
actions.description: The guard takes a moment to rest and recover strength.

actions.title: Alert
actions.description: The guard is informed of potential threats nearby.

actions.title: Recalibrate
actions.description: The guard recalibrates its weapons for optimal performance.

Hidden.description: No line of sight to an explorer.

actions.title: Recharge
actions.description: Remove a wound counter from the Negavolt Cultist. If the Negavolt Cultist does ot have a wound counter, treat this result as an Advance result instead. (Advance: More towards the closest explorer. Then attack the closest explorer that is in range and visible to this hostile.

actions.title: Covert Scan
actions.description: The drone scans hidden targets using advanced sensors.

actions.title: Cloaked Surveillance
actions.description: The drone monitors the area with cloaked sensors.

actions.title: Invisible
actions.description: The drone becomes nearly invisible to avoid detection.

actions.title: Laser Assault
actions.description: The drone launches a targeted laser attack.

actions.title: Data Transfer
actions.description: The drone sends combat data to allies.

actions.title: Energy Blast
actions.description: The drone releases a powerful energy blast at its target.

actions.title: Shield Pulse
actions.description: The drone activates a shield pulse to protect itself.

actions.title: Hover
actions.description: The drone hovers close by, monitoring the situation.

actions.title: Scan
actions.description: The drone performs a close-range scan for tactical insight.

actions.title: Close Support
actions.description: The drone provides support to nearby allies.

actions.title: Resupply
actions.description: The drone resupplies ammunition erratically and efficiently.

Other.description: Not engaged, performing diagnostics or standby functions.

actions.title: Standby
actions.description: The drone is on standby, awaiting further commands.

actions.title: Recharge
actions.description: The drone recharges its power cells.

actions.title: Monitor Mode
actions.description: The drone enters monitor mode to track environmental changes.

actions.title: Diagnostics
actions.description: The drone performs a system check.

Hidden.description: Lurking in the shadows, waiting to strike.

actions.title: Stalk
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul stalks its prey, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

actions.title: Listeners
actions.description: Using its acute hearing, the creature listens for movement.

actions.title: Dark Ambush
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul prepares a dark ambush from the shadows.

actions.title: Vanish
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul vanishes from sight, becoming part of the darkness.

actions.title: Savage Attack
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul launches a savage melee attack.

actions.title: Ferocious Claw
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul slashes with its deadly claws.

actions.title: Frenzied Assault
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul attacks in a frenzy, overwhelming its target.

actions.title: Wild Swing
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul swings wildly with overwhelming force.

actions.title: Scent Hunt
actions.description: The creature relies on its enhanced senses to track prey.

actions.title: Close Encounter
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul engages in a close encounter.

actions.title: Territorial Display
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul makes a display to assert its dominance.

actions.title: Near Ambush
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul sets up an ambush at close range.

Other.description: Not engaged, focusing on rest or other activities.

actions.title: Howl
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul emits a blood-curdling howl.

actions.title: Feed
actions.description: The Ur-Ghoul takes time to feed on fallen enemies.

actions.title: Loner
actions.description: Relying on solitude, the Ur-Ghoul bides its time alone.

actions.title: Rest
actions.description: The creature takes a moment to rest, conserving its energy.

Hidden.description: Out of sight, preparing for assault.

actions.title: Conceal
actions.description: The Chaos Marine conceals itself, planning its next move.

actions.title: Monitor
actions.description: The marine monitors the field silently, gathering intelligence.

actions.title: Stealth Advance
actions.description: The marine advances stealthily, avoiding detection.

actions.title: Decoy
actions.description: The marine sets up a decoy to mislead the enemy.

Engaged.description: In combat, using a mix of tactics.

actions.title: Bolter Fire
actions.description: Rapid bolter fire erupts from the Chaos Marine.

actions.title: Melee
actions.description: The marine engages in hand-to-hand combat.

actions.title: Rage Strike
actions.description: The marine performs a powerful strike infused with rage.

actions.title: War Cry
actions.description: The marine lets out a war cry, boosting morale of allies.

Close.description: Positioned near enemy lines for influence.

actions.title: Advance
actions.description: The Chaos Marine advances on the enemy position.

actions.title: Flank
actions.description: The marine attempts to flank the enemy forces.

actions.title: Charge
actions.description: The marine charges the enemy lines with aggressive fervor.

actions.title: Barrage
actions.description: A barrage of shots is fired from a close range.

Other.description: Not in active combat, strategizing or recharging.

actions.title: Survey
actions.description: The Chaos Marine surveys the battlefield.

actions.title: Regroup
actions.description: The marine regroups with nearby allies.

actions.title: Meditation
actions.description: The marine meditates, focusing its chaotic energies.

actions.title: Meditate
actions.description: The Chaos Marine takes a moment to reflect and recharge.

Hidden.description: Lying in wait, ready to spring out.

actions.title: Wait
actions.description: The Beastman waits in shadows, ready to pounce.

actions.title: Blend
actions.description: The creature blends with the environment silently.

actions.title: Stealth Hunt
actions.description: The Beastman hunts silently, leaving little trace.

actions.title: Disappear
actions.description: The Beastman disappears from sight amidst chaos.

Engaged.description: Attacking ferociously, driven by primal fury.

actions.title: Rampage
actions.description: The Beastman goes on a rampage, attacking anything in its way.

actions.title: Roar
actions.description: A deafening roar echoes as the Beastman charges.

actions.title: Feral Charge
actions.description: The Beastman charges with intense ferocity.

actions.title: Pummel
actions.description: The Beastman pummels its target with brute strength.

Close.description: Close to the enemy, poised to attack.

actions.title: Stalk
actions.description: The Beastman stalks its target at a close distance.

actions.title: Circle
actions.description: The creature circles its prey, looking for weaknesses.

actions.title: Vicious Proximity
actions.description: The Beastman engages its target within lethal range.

actions.title: Ambush Setup
actions.description: The Beastman sets up an ambush near its prey.

Other.description: Not in combat, preparing or resting.

actions.title: Bellow
actions.description: The Beastman bellows, calling others to its side.

actions.title: Graze
actions.description: The Beastman takes a moment to graze and rest.

actions.title: Watchful Wait
actions.description: The Beastman waits and watches, scanning for targets.

actions.title: Hide
actions.description: The Beastman hides, waiting for a better opportunity.
